main_definition: German, when used as an adjective or a noun, refers to something originating from Germany, characteristics of the German language, people from Germany, or things related to German culture.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Related to the country of Germany
Of or pertaining to the German language

meanings_and_examples.example: The group is composed of several talented Germans.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Related to things that originate from or are influenced by German culture and traditions
meanings_and_examples.example: Its design reflects classic German aesthetics.
